body:
Hey everyone, I decided to start a new series on my channel, which I've been looking forward to for a very long time, which is Team Fortress 2!
I made an "intro" video to the series, which will explain how the series will be.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJ87dgUEWpA

I hope you guys enjoy this, and if you wish to add me on Steam, my name is "MLGPorky"! :)
Thanks everyone!

*Please note that this is in "Off-Topic", and I am in no way advertising anything.*

title: For All You TF2 Players!

replies.body:
Just a question...how did you manage to get that "old" graphics version of TF2?
Im curious.

And we should play sometime :)
replies.body_tagged:
Just a question...how did you manage to get that "old" graphics version of TF2?
Im curious.

And we should play sometime :)

replies.body:
Sorry for the late response, I was gone yesterday to a different city so I wasn't able to answer!

Anyways, what I use is called a "hud", which is basically like a resource pack in Minecraft. :)

It's not an old version of TF2; it's just some changes in the graphics. :D

And for sure, we should play together soon! :D

replies.body:
Yeah rocket jumping is one of my favourite things to do when using the soldier class, and I've been doing it for months so I would say that I'm pretty decent at it. :D

Also, I live in North America, but we could probably still play together! :)
